about_the_game:
Vitta Lucis is a mercenary from a private church guild, which is associated with the Prophecy of Oblivion. Gather a squad and go on an adventure action in the spirit of dark fantasy. Partly, faith in God turned out to be a mistake - curses, demons and other evil spirits exist.

WORK IN PROGRESS - DOES NOT REPRESENT THE FINAL LOOK OF THE GAME

The world is on the brink of the apocalypse - demons exterminate people mired in sins and vices, which feeds the forces of evil. But this has not united humanity at all, the struggle for power continues, everyone is looking for benefits only for themselves. There are also those who have fallen into despondency due to hopelessness - an easy target not only for demons.

The main character is a mercenary, one of the church demons, who received her powers to fight evil, but not of her own free will. She remembers nothing about the past after receiving powers. She travels the world, helps those she meets and tries to stop demons in different ways. She carries out orders from ordinary and noble people, and also participates in political intrigues. She is also looking for a way to decipher the Prophecy of Oblivion, which is somehow connected with her. On her way, she meets other church demons, from which the player can assemble a squad, since mercenaries mostly try to help each other.

The game world is divided into separate locations with the ability to return, which open up as you progress. In urban locations, there are practically no enemies to fight, unlike non-urban ones. When exploring locations, you can find points of interest that open up additional locations for passage. They in turn give additional rewards, expands the story with the ability to influence the main plot.

The main character travels on foot and has the opportunity to assemble a squad of other church demons. Also, among the church demons in the squad, the main character may be absent - a game convention. This is necessary to complete the game - the selection of characters in the squad is part of the build. All characters in the squad are always on the screen, it is possible to switch between them. During the battle, the player controls only the active character, the rest of the squad are controlled by the computer. In cutscenes, the story is told from the perspective of the characters participating in the story, and not in the squad.

If you replay additional activities, then the pumping has a cumulative effect - the progress is not reset. You can also replay boss battles for additional farming. Additional stories are planned. It is also possible to continue the story campaign and the appearance of new church demons as playable characters.

content_descriptors.notes: Vitta Lucis contains adult content and may include strong language, violence and blood.
